pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fluid Use of Big Data in R // Methods to get a grip on working with remote data sources ('SQL' databases, 'sparklyr' 'Spark' 2.0.0 and above) through 'dplyr'. Adds convenience functions to make such tasks more like working with an in-memory 'data.frame'. Results do depend on which 'dplyr' data service you use.
